channel.title: Research on CharlyCst
channel.description: Recent content in Research on CharlyCst

item.title: Reflections on Core Gapping
item.description: As my work on core gapping recently got published to ASPLOS (to be presented at ASPLOS'25), I’ll use this opportunity to take a step back and write down some of my thoughts, one year after starting the project. When I started my visiting at Google’s system research group last year, we decided to look into the upcoming Arm CCA extension. Arm CCA stands for Confidential Computing Architecture, Arm’s solution for confidential VMs.
